Uses of Package
org.ow2.play.commons.accesscontrol.api

  • Packages that use org.ow2.play.commons.accesscontrol.api 
    Package Description
    org.ow2.play.commons.accesscontrol  
    org.ow2.play.commons.accesscontrol.api  
  • Classes in org.ow2.play.commons.accesscontrol.api used by org.ow2.play.commons.accesscontrol 
    Class and Description
    Access
    Validate permissions based on URIs for agents, objects and rights.
    AccessManagementException 
    Permission
    Permission levels defined by http://www.w3.org/wiki/WebAccessControl and extended for PLAY by reusing publish/subscribe vocabulary from https://www.oasis-open.org/committees/wsn/.
  • Classes in org.ow2.play.commons.accesscontrol.api used by org.ow2.play.commons.accesscontrol.api 
    Class and Description
    AccessManagementException 
    Group 
    Permission
    Permission levels defined by http://www.w3.org/wiki/WebAccessControl and extended for PLAY by reusing publish/subscribe vocabulary from https://www.oasis-open.org/committees/wsn/.
